ENS International Participant Email
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please remember to complete your two ENS Pre-Program Questionnaires by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}.
The 2 pre-program questionnaires are:
Program Focus Questionnaire 'PFQ'- the PFQ helps the Lead Facilitator to customise the workshop based on your needs. We ask that all PFQs are completed by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}. Click here to access the questionnaire.*Please note that this link is specific to you, please don't forward it to others. Negotiating and Influencing Profile ‘NIP’ - the NIP covers 20 key competencies relating to the negotiation and influencing capabilities of individuals. You will receive a separate email with instructions to logon and complete the NIP online. This should take approximately 20 minutes. We ask that all NIPs are completed by {!Contact.Job_NIP_Due_Date__c}.
NB: If you have already started your questionnaire and have opted to 'save and continue' while in the questionnaire - it is important that you use the link that was sent to you at the time you saved your response, otherwise the above link will open a new questionnaire.
We look forward to seeing you at the workshop, a key part of Takeda's M4NTRA Program!
Kind regards,
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_CSC_Title__c}
ENS International - Level 5, 83 York Street, Sydney 2000, NSW, Australia Phone: +61 2 9299 9688
